\documentclass[12pt]{report}
\usepackage[backend=biber]{biblatex}
\usepackage{pythontex}

\addbibresource{biblatex-examples.tex}

% \begin{noindent}
\begin{pycode}
import re

def get_bibliography_citations():
	with open('biblatex-examples.tex', 'r') as f:
		extracted_citations = ""
		pattern = re.compile(r'@\w+\{(.*),', re.M)
		bib_contents = f.read()
		for m in re.finditer(pattern, bib_contents):
			extracted_citations += f"{m.group(1)}: \\cite{{{m.group(1)}}}\n\n"
		return extracted_citations
\end{pycode}
% \end{noindent}

\begin{document}
Bibliography citations:
\py{get_bibliography_citations()}

\printbibliography
\end{document}
